verses.name: Lamentations 3:1
verses.text: Ego vir videns paupertatem meam  in virga indignationis ejus.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:2
verses.text: Me minavit, et adduxit in tenebras,  et non in lucem.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:3
verses.text: Tantum in me vertit et convertit  manum suam tota die.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:4
verses.text: Vetustam fecit pellem meam et carnem meam ;  contrivit ossa mea.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:5
verses.text: Ædificavit in gyro meo, et circumdedit me  felle et labore.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:6
verses.text: In tenebrosis collocavit me,  quasi mortuos sempiternos.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:7
verses.text: Circumædificavit adversum me, ut non egrediar ;  aggravavit compedem meum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:8
verses.text: Sed et cum clamavero, et rogavero,  exclusit orationem meam.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:9
verses.text: Conclusit vias meas lapidibus quadris ;  semitas meas subvertit.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:10
verses.text: Ursus insidians factus est mihi,  leo in absconditis.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:11
verses.text: Semitas meas subvertit, et confregit me ;  posuit me desolatam.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:12
verses.text: Tetendit arcum suum, et posuit me  quasi signum ad sagittam.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:13
verses.text: Misit in renibus meis  filias pharetræ suæ.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:14
verses.text: Factus sum in derisum omni populo meo,  canticum eorum tota die.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:15
verses.text: Replevit me amaritudinibus ;  inebriavit me absinthio.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:16
verses.text: Et fregit ad numerum dentes meos ;  cibavit me cinere.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:17
verses.text: Et repulsa est a pace anima mea ;  oblitus sum bonorum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:18
verses.text: Et dixi : Periit finis meus,  et spes mea a Domino.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:19
verses.text: Recordare paupertatis, et transgressionis meæ,  absinthii et fellis.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:20
verses.text: Memoria memor ero, et tabescet  in me anima mea.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:21
verses.text: Hæc recolens in corde meo,  ideo sperabo.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:22
verses.text: Misericordiæ Domini, quia non sumus consumpti ;  quia non defecerunt miserationes ejus.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:23
verses.text: Novi diluculo,  multa est fides tua.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:24
verses.text: Pars mea Dominus, dixit anima mea ;  propterea exspectabo eum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:25
verses.text: Bonus est Dominus sperantibus in eum,  animæ quærenti illum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:26
verses.text: Bonum est præstolari cum silentio  salutare Dei.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:27
verses.text: Bonum est viro cum portaverit jugum  ab adolescentia sua.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:28
verses.text: Sedebit solitarius, et tacebit,  quia levavit super se.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:29
verses.text: Ponet in pulvere os suum,  si forte sit spes.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:30
verses.text: Dabit percutienti se maxillam :  saturabitur opprobriis.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:31
verses.text: Quia non repellet  in sempiternum Dominus.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:32
verses.text: Quia si abjecit, et miserebitur,  secundum multitudinem misericordiarum suarum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:33
verses.text: Non enim humiliavit ex corde suo  et abjecit filios hominum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:34
verses.text: Ut conteret sub pedibus suis  omnes vinctos terræ.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:35
verses.text: Ut declinaret judicium viri  in conspectu vultus Altissimi.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:36
verses.text: Ut perverteret hominem in judicio suo ;  Dominus ignoravit.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:37
verses.text: Quis est iste qui dixit ut fieret,  Domino non jubente ?

verses.name: Lamentations 3:38
verses.text: Ex ore Altissimi non egredientur  nec mala nec bona ?

verses.name: Lamentations 3:39
verses.text: Quid murmuravit homo vivens,  vir pro peccatis suis ?

verses.name: Lamentations 3:40
verses.text: Scrutemur vias nostras, et quæramus,  et revertamur ad Dominum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:41
verses.text: Levemus corda nostra cum manibus  ad Dominum in cælos.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:42
verses.text: Nos inique egimus, et ad iracundiam provocavimus ;  idcirco tu inexorabilis es.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:43
verses.text: Operuisti in furore, et percussisti nos ;  occidisti, nec pepercisti.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:44
verses.text: Opposuisti nubem tibi,  ne transeat oratio.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:45
verses.text: Eradicationem et abjectionem posuisti me  in medio populorum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:46
verses.text: Aperuerunt super nos os suum  omnes inimici.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:47
verses.text: Formido et laqueus facta est nobis  vaticinatio, et contritio.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:48
verses.text: Divisiones aquarum deduxit oculus meus,  in contritione filiæ populi mei.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:49
verses.text: Oculus meus afflictus est, nec tacuit,  eo quod non esset requies.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:50
verses.text: Donec respiceret et videret  Dominus de cælis.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:51
verses.text: Oculus meus deprædatus est animam meam  in cunctis filiabus urbis meæ.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:52
verses.text: Venatione ceperunt me quasi avem  inimici mei gratis.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:53
verses.text: Lapsa est in lacum vita mea,  et posuerunt lapidem super me.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:54
verses.text: Inundaverunt aquæ super caput meum ;  dixi : Perii.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:55
verses.text: Invocavi nomen tuum, Domine,  de lacu novissimo.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:56
verses.text: Vocem meam audisti ; ne avertas aurem tuam  a singultu meo et clamoribus.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:57
verses.text: Appropinquasti in die quando invocavi te ;  dixisti : Ne timeas.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:58
verses.text: Judicasti, Domine, causam animæ meæ,  redemptor vitæ meæ.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:59
verses.text: Vidisti, Domine, iniquitatem illorum adversum me :  judica judicium meum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:60
verses.text: Vidisti omnem furorem,  universas cogitationes eorum adversum me.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:61
verses.text: Audisti opprobrium eorum, Domine,  omnes cogitationes eorum adversum me.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:62
verses.text: Labia insurgentium mihi, et meditationes eorum  adversum me tota die.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:63
verses.text: Sessionem eorum et resurrectionem eorum vide ;  ego sum psalmus eorum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:64
verses.text: Redes eis vicem, Domine,  juxta opera manuum suarum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:65
verses.text: Dabis eis scutum cordis,  laborem tuum.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:66
verses.text: Persequeris in furore, et conteres eos  sub cælis, Domine.
